name: Oregon SBA Minority Owned Business Certification
address: Various locations across Oregon (contact for specific office)
category: American-Indian-owned Industry-specific certification programs in Oregon
description: This program certifies businesses that are at least 51% owned by members of "Socially Disadvantaged Groups," which include Native Americans. Certification helps businesses gain visibility and access to opportunities
services: American-Indian-owned Industry-specific certification programs in Oregon consultation

name: Certification Office for Business Inclusion and Diversity (COBID)
address: 100 SW Market Street, Suite 250, Portland, OR 97201
category: American-Indian-owned Industry-specific certification programs in Oregon
description: COBID offers certifications such as Minority Business Enterprise (MBE), Women Business Enterprise (WBE), and Emerging Small Business (ESB). Native American-owned businesses can qualify for MBE certification
services: American-Indian-owned Industry-specific certification programs in Oregon consultation

name: Northwest Native APEX Accelerator
address: Various locations, serving Oregon, Washington, and Idaho (contact for specific office)
category: American-Indian-owned Industry-specific certification programs in Oregon
description: This program provides technical assistance to American Indian/Alaskan Native, Native Hawaiian-owned businesses, Tribes, and Tribal Enterprises, particularly for government contracting
services: American-Indian-owned Industry-specific certification programs in Oregon consultation

name: Oregon Native American Business and Entrepreneurship Network (ONABEN)
category: American-Indian-owned Industry-specific certification programs in Oregon
description: ONABEN provides training, curriculum, and organizational capacity-building to promote entrepreneurship among Native and Indigenous communities. They offer programs like Indianpreneurship®
services: American-Indian-owned Industry-specific certification programs in Oregon consultation

name: Oregon Small Business Development Center (SBDC) Network
address: 20 Centers across Oregon (find a center near you)
category: American-Indian-owned Industry-specific certification programs in Oregon
description: The SBDC Network offers no-cost, confidential advising, training, and resources to all business owners, including Native American entrepreneurs, to help them start and grow their businesses
services: American-Indian-owned Industry-specific certification programs in Oregon consultation

name: U.S. Small Business Administration (SBA) - Office of Native American Affairs (ONAA)
address: Various SBA district offices nationwide (contact for Oregon resources)
category: American-Indian-owned Industry-specific certification programs in Oregon
description: ONAA provides access to business growth and expansion tools for Native-owned businesses, including technical assistance and information on programs like the 8(a) Business Development program
services: American-Indian-owned Industry-specific certification programs in Oregon consultation

name: Tribally Owned or Chartered Entities Registration (Oregon Secretary of State)
category: American-Indian-owned Industry-specific certification programs in Oregon
description: This service allows tribally owned or chartered entities in Oregon to register with the Secretary of State, which can be a step in formalizing their business operations
services: American-Indian-owned Industry-specific certification programs in Oregon consultation

name: Micro Enterprise Services of Oregon (MESO)
category: American-Indian-owned Industry-specific certification programs in Oregon
description: MESO provides personalized business assistance, including classes, consulting, and access to capital, with a focus on supporting minority-owned businesses
services: American-Indian-owned Industry-specific certification programs in Oregon consultation

name: Oregon Native American Chamber (ONAC)
category: American-Indian-owned Industry-specific certification programs in Oregon
description: ONAC is dedicated to assisting Oregon-based Native businesses through education, training, networking, and technical assistance programs
services: American-Indian-owned Industry-specific certification programs in Oregon consultation

name: Northwest Mountain Minority Supplier Development Council (NWMSDC)
category: American-Indian-owned Industry-specific certification programs in Oregon
description: As a regional affiliate of the National Minority Supplier Development Council (NMSDC), NWMSDC certifies minority-owned businesses, which can include Native American-owned businesses, for corporate supplier diversity programs
